TEI.2.document_title: M A Bryan to James F Perry, 08-07-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: M. A. Bryan to James F. Perry, August 7, 1834. favorable rumors concerning Austin. Commercial accounts. Duel between Austin [Henry?] and Wharton.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This was John A. Wharton. It seems to have been William T. Austin.

*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe De Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-07-1834">August 7th 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Father*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Inquire of *person_mentioned*Maj Henrie*/person_mentioned* about a cow we lent him to milk when he lived here and see if he kept it or if *person_mentioned*Jones */person_mentioned*got it I see no entry of the cow (to nobody) on the books except she is credited to *person_mentioned*Doct Peebles*/person_mentioned* (whom we got her from) *person_mentioned*Mrs Lesassier*/person_mentioned*s cloak has never come to hand. I expect it was not put abord of the Keel boat the *person_mentioned*Doctor */person_mentioned*has not settled with *person_mentioned*Splane */person_mentioned*he put it off as he expected you up I received your letter dated *date_mentioned n="07-31-1834">31 July*/date_mentioned* and was verry sorrey to here that *person_mentioned*Guy */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Mama */person_mentioned*were indisposed I have wrote to *person_mentioned*Guy*/person_mentioned* which you will see—I send this by *person_mentioned*Mr P. Jack*/person_mentioned*,*person_mentioned* Mr. Spencer Jack*/person_mentioned* has not got back from above I am expecting you daily, it is the opinion of the *person_mentioned*Doct */person_mentioned*and in fact all the citizens of this place that it will be an expence and trouble for nothing sending *person_mentioned*Jack */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Grayson */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*I am convinced of the fact as to my own part since *date_mentioned n="09-06-1834">yesterday */date_mentioned*when the male came in (brought no letter from *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*except some for *person_mentioned*Almonte*/person_mentioned*) there was a letter from *person_mentioned*Johnson */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Ross */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Sanantonio */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*Bexar */location_mentioned*who states that the *person_mentioned*Political Chief*/person_mentioned* as well as all the *person_mentioned*head men*/person_mentioned* and all the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamientos */person_mentioned*are disposed to favor his plan or the petition that (they *person_mentioned*Johnson */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Ross */person_mentioned*representatives of the people) had proposed and *person_mentioned*Uncle */person_mentioned*writes that is all that is wanted for the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento of *location_mentioned*San Antonio*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* to draw up a petition and make a plane statement of facts and it would open the door of his *location_mentioned*dungeon */location_mentioned*this combined with the letters *person_mentioned*Almonte */person_mentioned*has wrote to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*will relase him with out any farther expence or trouble, the *person_mentioned*Doctor */person_mentioned*paid the express that was sent up by *person_mentioned*J. Duke*/person_mentioned* at your request it amounted to twenty three dollars I send you enclosed act. on *person_mentioned*John Henrie*/person_mentioned* he say *person_mentioned*Mr Somervill*/person_mentioned* agreed to give him $1.50 pr day while he remained in the *location_mentioned*store */location_mentioned*I was sick at the time and consequently no not how long he remained in the store and *person_mentioned*Mr S.*/person_mentioned* did not tell me how much he was to allow him—you and him can settle I think probably it was about ten days *person_mentioned*Maj. Henrie*/person_mentioned* is up on the creek at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Lewis*/person_mentioned*es */location_mentioned*I do not know when he will go down I loaned *person_mentioned*Mr Milliby*/person_mentioned* the *person_mentioned*carpenter */person_mentioned*whom you had employed three dollars which you can settle with him for I would like for you to come up as there is great need of your assistance for a day or two, and bring a horse for me to go down home with you. If you do not come please send a horse by the first opportunity as I cant get any where on act. of not having a horse I have had the fever but thank God I have recovered my health again I was only confined to my bed 7 or 8 das it was at the time that *person_mentioned*man */person_mentioned*was hung therefore I did not see him hung. My respects and love to All the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and beleive me yours as ever sincere etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M Austin Bryan*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*N B The *person_mentioned*Doctor */person_mentioned*has been up the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*8 or 10 day we are expecting him down every Day, *person_mentioned*Maj. Burnet the Judge*/person_mentioned* is now giving *person_mentioned*Almonte */person_mentioned*a long talk as respects *person_mentioned*Uncle*/person_mentioned*s Imprisonment etc etc The memorial from *location_mentioned*Matagorda */location_mentioned*was useless as ther was a copy of the original here so there was trouble and expence for nothing*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M A Bryan */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*Doct*/person_mentioned*. sold the Gentle mule to*person_mentioned* Groc[e]*/person_mentioned* for 75$ therefore I cant go any where for want of an animal*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr John M Henrie*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*In Act. with *person_mentioned*Perry and Somervell*/person_mentioned**/p*

*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F Perry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach Point*/location_mentioned*, Politeness *person_mentioned*Mr P C. Jack*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*The duel between *person_mentioned*Wharton */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*has taken place *person_mentioned*Wharton*/person_mentioned* got his arme broke and badly shattered so much so that it is proble he will loose it. I saw *person_mentioned*Doct Jones*/person_mentioned* this morning he says he thinks if you make use of ... it will be all the medicine you will want but if you have a repetition of the fever you ought to take some of the pills he sent you I send by *person_mentioned*Mr Henry */person_mentioned*the Ginger and Columbia root which you forgot*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
